elements.title: Which of the following statements are correct and which are incorrect? If they are incorrect, correct the statements.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Offer development: When a company creates an offer for potential customers, it does not necessarily have to ensure that it fully takes into account the needs and requirements of its customers.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Correction:
elements.correctAnswer: Offer development: When a company creates an offer for potential customers, it must ensure that it takes full account of the needs and requirements of its clientele.

elements.title: Which of the following statements are correct and which are incorrect? If they are incorrect, correct the statements.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: The identification of current challenges is not central to the needs analysis and should be left to the customer.

elements.name: question8
elements.title: Correction:
elements.correctAnswer: Focusing on specific difficulties that could affect the normal course of business is central to the needs analysis. Challenges should be documented in detail in order to create a clear basis for possible solutions.
